channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [FLINK-20331] UnalignedCheckpointITCase.execute failed with "Sequence number for checkpoint 20 is not known (it was likely been overwritten by a newer checkpoint 21)"

item.summary: UnalignedCheckpointITCase.execute failed with "Sequence number for checkpoint 20 is not known (it was likely been overwritten by a newer checkpoint 21)"

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Set the priority as "Blocker" before we figure out the root cause of this problem.
This ticket is most likely a real bug. I hope roman_khachatryan can investigate (or else I will do after fixing test instabilities).

Not a real bug but a too strict assumption.

Merged a fix as 50af0b161b1962d9db5c692aa965b310a4000da9 in master.

Merged as 2c77c38d55 into release-1.12.
